Package elki.database.query.distance

Interface SpatialDistanceQuery<V extends SpatialComparable>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Vector type
    All Superinterfaces:
    DistanceQuery<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpatialPrimitiveDistanceQuery, SpatialPrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery
    public interface SpatialDistanceQuery<V extends SpatialComparable>
extends DistanceQuery<V>
    Query interface for spatial distance queries.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
